sentences: Are you on the lookout for a new role? I've got an opportunity that could be of interest to you
This is an exciting opportunity to join a market leader in their industry
The company deliver cutting edge solutions around the world!   As the Software Engineer you will design and implement the company's systems
This will be a fast paced environment where you will be encouraged to share ideas and have an input throughout the process
The company boast am excellent benefits package:
Life and long term illness insurance
If this opportunity is of interest to you then get in touch to arrange a call to find out more!
Hays Specialist Recruitment Limited acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment and employment business for the supply of temporary workers
By applying for this job you accept the T&C's, Privacy Policy and Disclaimers which can be found at hays
